class.name: JMeshShape3D
class.brief_description: A 3D concave trimesh shape used for physics collision.
class.description: A 3D concave trimesh shape defined by a set of triangles. This is the Jolt version of Godot's [ConcavePolygonShape3D]. This shape type can only be used with solid static objects. It will not work with dynamic, kinematic, or trigger objects.
